DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis : To compare novel refractive surgery ( SMILE , intervention group ) traditional refractive surgery ( FS-LASIK , control group ) term visual acuity , high order aberration , corneal biomechanical parameter complication . SMILE surgery might offer advantage aspect compare FS-LASIK surgery . Study program The procedure study list follow : All participant accept refractive surgery select first , patient ' routine postoperative examination include UCVA , BCVA , slit lamp microscopy , non-contact IOP , corneal topography Scheimpflug tomography system , ocular high order aberration use WASCA analyzer ( Carl Zeiss Meditec AG ) , corneal biomechanical property acquire Ocular Response Analyzer and/or Corvis ST ( Corvis ST , OCULUS , Wetzlar , Germany ) 1 week , 1 month , 3 month 6 month follow-up period surgery . Statistics : Patients decide choose SMILE surgery FS-LASIK select participant . The propensity match method use choose proper case two group . The propensity match method calculate SPSS software . The independent variable include : central corneal thickness ( CCT ) , Km ( mean Pentacam keratometry ) , spherical diopter ( manifest refraction ) , cylindrical diopter ( manifest refraction ) , UCVA , BCVA , corneal resistance factor ( CRF ) corneal hysteresis ( CH ) ( investigator Ocular Response Analyzer ) cornea preoperative . The close score eye two group match . The data preserve site , systematically collect analyzed TianjinEH center . The statistical expert Dr Hayes American Pacific University statistical consultant , also charge sample size calculation , instructor statistical analysis , quality control .
